resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73342</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73342</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>839b3a3a-3ba0-4d92-86ff-557459b9819b#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Erszényes ördög</string>
            <string language="en">Marsupial devil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beutelteufel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diable marsupial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diabo marsupial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diavolo marsupiale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Marsupial διάβολος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diablo marsupial</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Tasmániában él, a lakott településeken is gyakori. Ragadozó és dögevő. Ha megtámadják, éles, ijesztő hangot ad.</string>
            <string language="en">Lives in Tasmania, also frequent in inhabited places. Carnivorous and carrion-eating. It gives sharp, frightening sound when it's attacked</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  erszényesek,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, marsupials</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Leben in Tasmanien, frequentieren auch in 
bewohnten Plätzen. Fleischfressend und Aas-Essen. Es gibt
scharfen, erschreckenden Ton, wenn es in Angriff genommen wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les vies en Tasmanie, fréquentent également dans
les endroits habités. Carnivore et charogne-manger. Elle 
donne le bruit pointu et effrayant quand elle est attaquée</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As vidas em Tasmânia, freqüentam também em 
lugares habitados. Carnivorous e carrion-comer. Dá o som 
afiado, frightening quando é atacada</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le vite in Tasmania, egualmente frequentano nei 
posti abitati. Carnivoro e carrion-mangiare. Dà il suono 
tagliente e spaventoso quando è attacata</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωές στην Τασμανία, επίσης συχνή στις κατοικημένες 
θέσεις. Σαρκοφάγος και θαρρηον-τρώγοντας. Δίνει τον 
αιχμηρό, εκφοβίζοντας ήχο όταν επιτίθεται</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las vidas en Tasmania, también frecuentan en 
lugares habitados. Carnívoro y el carrion-comer. Da el 
sonido sostenido, espantoso cuando se ataca</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, Beuteltiere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifères, marsupiaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mamíferos, marsupiais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammiferi, marsupiali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θηλαστικά, marsupials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamíferos, marsupiales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73342</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=839b3a3a-3ba0-4d92-86ff-557459b9819b&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
"
